description: I am doing Computer Science course at University of Bristol. I am proud to be a part of this prestigious community.

As a member of Southampton Solent University team, I have attended TM Forum Open Hack Nice 2017. I am proud to say that my team won the first place. We presented an idea and a prototype of an IOT project called Smart Ports.

Few months after I joind Southampton Solent University, I became a part of the Code Fire team. I was working as an AngularJS developer on an application for Merchant Navy Welfare Board in Southampton.
Attending EuroSkills competition in Sweden was a really wonderful experience. Winning the second place in the web development category was even better. I am very proud of this achievement.
I was doing Software Engineering course that covers Python, Java, web technologies and mathematics.

In July 2016, I graduated from Secondary School of Electrical Engineering in Prešov. I achieved the best results in all competencies including mathematics, programming, databases, networking and other related computing related units.
I have taken a part in the Vernadsky National Contest in Moscow, Russia. Presenting a 'student management system' developed for a local secondary school by me and my two classmates.
After winning the competition in 2015, I was determined to repeat this great accomplishment. It was harder than the previous year, but I managed to win again.

I and my two classmates have developed a 'student management system' for a local secondary school. We attended this nationwide competition and managed to get a second place. From there we advanced to Vernadsky National Contest in Russia, Moscow.

event: Honorable Mention of Achievements in Mathematical and Information Technology Competitions
description: Honorable Mention of Achievements in Mathematical and Information Technology Competitions awarded by IT Valley Košice for participating in and winning a nationwide competition in web development.

Lead Software Developer. Working in Laravel, AngularJS and VueJS. I also performed server provisioning, deployments and other devops related tasks. In total, I have worked on 5 major projects within teams of 3-4 people.

A nationwide competition in informatics taking part in Slovakia. I (programmer) and my classmate (graphic designer) have competed in the 'web development' category. The competition consisted of designing and developing a PHP web application (in Laravel 😍).
I was volunteering as a web development lecturer at a local secondary school. It was very exciting and I gained a lot of experience from it.
